CustomField.description: URL to the related project in Jira.
CustomField.formula: IF(pse__Sync_With_Jira__c && !ISBLANK(pse__Jira_Correlation_ID__c) && (ISPICKVAL(pse__Jira_Project__c , '') || ISPICKVAL(pse__Jira_Project__c , 'None')), HYPERLINK($Setup.pse__Integration_Hub_Connector_Jira_PSA__c.pse__Jira_Application_URL__c + '/browse/' + pse__Jira_Project_Key__c, 'View Project in Jira' ,'_blank') ,'')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: URL to the related project in Jira.
CustomField.label: Jira Project URL
